risks.description: Indicates the application has the lowest amount of risk for data loss or a security breach. These applications allow users to perform low-risk actions such as viewing content, listening to music, downloading files,  and more.
risks.name: Low

applications.description: MobileIron is a mobile device management (MDM) system that provides ITS with a means of governing mobile access to WCM resources, including email, calendar, contacts, and other central applications.
applications.name: Mobileiron

risk.description: Indicates the application has the lowest amount of risk for data loss or a security breach. These applications allow users to perform low-risk actions such as viewing content, listening to music, downloading files,  and more.
risk.name: Low

applications.description: ZipShare is a web application that users can upload, share files which the files are zipped using WinZip's legendary compression, making them faster to download and saving bandwidth.
applications.name: ZipShare

risk.description: Indicates the application is extremely at risk for data loss or a security breach. These applications allow users to perform high-risk actions such as sending or sharing files and making remote connections that can bypass enterprise security.
risk.name: Very High

operationSettings.description: Uploading files to web applications. This also includes inserting local files into content being edited online. Actions that correspond to 'File Transfer' and 'Sharing' are not included.
operationSettings.name: Uploading

operationSettings.description: Sharing files with other users via web applications. This also includes generating share links and publishing files. Sharing public content, like SNS posts and news articles, is not included.
operationSettings.name: Sharing

operationSettings.description: Logging into a service and authenticating users within the service.
operationSettings.name: Login/Authentication

operationSettings.description: Making financial transactions such as buying, selling, paying, and remittance.
operationSettings.name: Paying And Transfering Money

applications.description: Cloud9 is a voice conversation platform for traders that allows one-click recording and voice analysis of phone contents. It is provided by Cloud9 Technologies.
applications.name: Cloud9

risk.description: Indicates the application is slightly at risk for data loss or a security breach. These applications allow users to perform slightly risky actions such as voting, rate scoring, text searches, translation, and more.
risk.name: Medium

categories.description: Websites that enable users to chat in real time through chat rooms, online conferences, video chat, or instant messaging.
categories.name: Chat Site

operationSettings.description: Uploading files to web applications. This also includes inserting local files into content being edited online. Actions that correspond to 'File Transfer' and 'Sharing' are not included.
operationSettings.name: Uploading

operationSettings.description: Editing or creating content/documents on web applications. Actions that correspond to 'Post' are not included.
operationSettings.name: Editing

operationSettings.description: Logging into a service and authenticating users within the service.
operationSettings.name: Login/Authentication

operationSettings.description: Downloading files from web applications. Actions such as exporting content or data are also included.
operationSettings.name: Downloading

operationSettings.description: Making financial transactions such as buying, selling, paying, and remittance.
operationSettings.name: Paying And Transfering Money

operationSettings.description: Text-based chatting on a web application.
operationSettings.name: Chatting

operationSettings.description: Sending files to others. Messaging functions in messengers, SNS, and conference services are included. Other file transfer functions are included in 'Uploading'.
operationSettings.name: File Transfer

operationSettings.description: Making video and voice calls. Primarily this includes messenger, groupware, and conference service functions. Actions that correspond to 'Broadcasting' are not included.
operationSettings.name: Calling

operationSettings.description: Inviting individuals to use web applications and their functions.
operationSettings.name: Inviting

operationSettings.description: Browsing content and files on web applications. This also includes multimedia playing actions that do not fall into 'Listening'.
operationSettings.name: Viewing Contents

categories.description: Websites that are blogs or host and publish blogs. These websites contain regularly posted entries that share views, commentary, or personal content. Blogs often include photos and multimedia.
categories.name: Blogging

categories.description: Websites that promote or feature excessive, graphic, or deliberate violence against humans or animals.
categories.name: Gore

operations.description: Connecting to other computers via web applications.
operations.name: Remote Connecting

operations.description: Delivering live streaming from users. Actions that correspond to 'Calling' are not included.
operations.name: Broadcasting

operations.description: Making financial transactions such as buying, selling, paying, and remittance.
operations.name: Paying And Transfering Money
